manual_intervention_reason: PM pipeline stopped at build (--stop-at) to bypass nested Claude Code limitation. Build executed directly in active Claude Code session.
notes: Upgraded CHAP AI system prompt from v1.0 to v2.0. Created centralized src/chap/system_prompt.py as single source of truth (14,025 chars). v2.0 adds: 9-section architecture (Identity, Hard Boundaries, Initialization Protocol, Architecture Self-Knowledge, Dynamic Component Discovery, Tenant Context Layer, Output Contract, Interaction Style, Scope), environment-aware posture (AUTHORITATIVE/EXPLORATORY/DIAGNOSTIC), COMPONENT_REGISTRY.json integration, tenant profile schema with feedback recursive loop, mandatory YAML output contract, IP boundary enforcement, prose-first response format. Backend chap_api.py now imports from centralized module. Frontend chapLlm.ts updated with v2.0 core prompt + demo context appendix. Zero Faraday IP leakage verified. Committed 47336c5 and pushed to main.
